sections.heading: 10-101 through 10-110 of this title may be cited as the "Protective Services for Vulnerable Adults Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1977, c. 264, ยง 1, emerg. eff. June 17, 1977. Amended by Laws 1984, c. 256, ยง 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1984; Laws 1986, c. 103, ยง 97, eff. Nov. 1, 1986. Renumbered from ยง 801 of this title by
